entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage flew through the air and burst open; she rose out of it with a loud, angry screech and sped off towards the castle without a backwards look.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: ‘Come back!’ Ron yelled after it, brandishing his broken wand. ‘Dad’ll kill me!’

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron miserably , bending down to pick up Scabbers the rat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: 'Come on,' said Harry wearily, 'we'd better get up to the school ...'

entities.name: car
entities.description: Loud thuds told him that the car was ejecting their luggage from the boot.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: Hedwig’s cage flew through the air and burst open; she rose out of it with a loud, angry screech and sped off towards the castle without a backwards look.

entities.name: tree
entities.description: 'Of all the trees we could’ve hit, we had to get one that hits back.'
